an10.222:1.1: “Visatiya, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an10.222:1.3: Attana ca panatipati hoti, paranca panatipate samadapeti;
an10.222:1.4: attana ca adinnadayi hoti, paranca adinnadane samadapeti;
an10.222:1.5: attana ca kamesumicchacari hoti, paranca kamesumicchacare samadapeti;
an10.222:1.6: attana ca musavadi hoti, paranca musavade samadapeti;
an10.222:1.7: attana ca pisunavaco hoti, paranca pisunaya vacaya samadapeti;
an10.222:1.8: attana ca pharusavaco hoti, paranca pharusaya vacaya samadapeti;
an10.222:1.9: attana ca samphappalapi hoti, paranca samphappalape samadapeti;
an10.222:1.10: attana ca abhijjhalu hoti, paranca abhijjhaya samadapeti;
an10.222:1.11: attana ca byapannacitto hoti, paranca byapade samadapeti;
an10.222:1.12: attana ca micchaditthiko hoti, paranca micchaditthiya samadapeti—
an10.222:1.13: imehi kho, bhikkhave, visatiya dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an10.222:2.1: Visatiya, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an10.222:2.3: Attana ca panatipata pativirato hoti, paranca panatipata veramaniya samadapeti;
an10.222:2.4: attana ca adinnadana pativirato hoti, paranca adinnadana veramaniya samadapeti;
an10.222:2.5: attana ca kamesumicchacara pativirato hoti, paranca kamesumicchacara veramaniya samadapeti;
an10.222:2.6: attana ca musavada pativirato hoti, paranca musavada veramaniya samadapeti;
an10.222:2.7: attana ca pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti, paranca pisunaya vacaya veramaniya samadapeti;
an10.222:2.8: attana ca pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti, paranca pharusaya vacaya veramaniya samadapeti;
an10.222:2.9: attana ca samphappalapa pativirato hoti, paranca samphappalapa veramaniya samadapeti;
an10.222:2.10: attana ca anabhijjhalu hoti, paranca anabhijjhaya samadapeti;
an10.222:2.11: attana ca abyapannacitto hoti, paranca abyapade samadapeti;
an10.222:2.12: attana ca sammaditthiko hoti, paranca sammaditthiya samadapeti—
an10.222:2.13: imehi kho, bhikkhave, visatiya dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
